source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a quiet street in a Japanese town on a sunny day. The camera slowly pans to the left, focusing on a traditional-style building on a street corner. In the background, mountains are visible under a blue sky with scattered clouds.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a quiet street in a Japanese town on a sunny day. The camera slowly pans to the left, focusing on a traditional-style building on a street corner. In the background, mountains are visible under a blue sky with scattered clouds.

generated_critique: The caption omits the motion of the people visible in the video. While it correctly describes the camera's pan to the left, it fails to mention the pedestrians walking along the sidewalk on the right. The instructions require mentioning the motion of secondary subjects. The description should be revised to include a brief mention of the people walking away from the camera.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot of a quiet street in a Japanese town on a sunny day, with a few pedestrians walking away from the camera on the right sidewalk. The camera slowly pans to the left, focusing on a traditional-style building on a street corner. In the background, mountains are visible under a blue sky with scattered clouds.
